comments: great teacher! he is always early before class, so if you need help he is there and will schedule office hours to meet with you one on one. go to all test reviews! he goes over all the material you need to know! he wants you to pass and gives alot of extra credit!

This was Professor Shen\'s first semester teaching at HCC. He really is not a very good teacher, however he is really helpful 1 on 1. He acts like you should know the material already. He gives a lot of extra credit, which is cool. He is pretty cute, though.
